ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Changes to Root/Snare (and other topics)
ygData.msgSnippet: Brilinnia, Congrats on 54.  And an excellent weekend!  For what it worth, my woodie also worships Tunare. /e positive At least Verant is trying to positively
ygData.messageBody:
Brilinnia,

Congrats on 54. And an excellent weekend! For what it worth, my woodie
also worships Tunare.

/e positive At least Verant is trying to positively impact the game
/e negative You would think Verant would learn how to test comprehensively
and in multiple situations. Do we see the emergency patch today or
tomorrow? I vote tomorrow.

Piemur
-----Original Message-----
From: Rebecca Small [mailto:rsmall@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 10, 2001 9:19 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com '
Subject: [eqbards] Changes to Root/Snare (and other topics)


I heard more than once and from several people in different zones that DD's
were breaking snares/roots last night. Mage mentioned it seemingly happening
at least once to us last night.

Other topies: My WE bard worships Tunare.

Adventures over the weekend: Finally dinged 54 in Howling Stones Monday
evening! I got a Sash of the Dragonborn there in South tower on Sunday. AC 2
plus haste. When the cleric let me melee a bit, I never stopped swinging! We
left HS to help take out the dragon in Emerald Jungle. I say helped, seemed
to stay feared or stunned the whole time. I lost the RBB lotto by one!
Monday we went back to HS but the paladin had to leave early on, so I tanked
along with a mage's air pet. The group seemed to think I was a better tank
than the poor pally! Friday was deep VK (I can't spell that name!). Died 4
times but had fun. I'm bound in GFay so I can buy stones for the cleric when
I die these days and found someone selling Ry'Gor chain pants during one
death. Everyone boggled at the rezzed bard wearing just chain pants! They
were about an even swap for my silvery legs, couple points AC vs couple
points Attack. I was instrument barding at the time and figure AC is more
useful. They do look odd when DE'ed. They have a purple sash look around the
waist. I even got a nice trade item while in VK, Spider Fur Cloak.
A very productive gaming weekend, I need to get too sick to paint and fix up
around the house more often!

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Excalibur, Xegony

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
